name: Power Service engineer
description:
Responsibilities:
  • Installation, repair, maintenance, commissioning of Power systems: UPS, VRLA\LiOn battery, LV panels (ATS, commission breakers), DG, main principle of MV;
  • Site survey for Power: check the current situation, recommendation for improvement
  • Acceptance of sites for installation&commission, supervising of Power systems.
  • Training of the Customer’s service team for operation and maintenance of the Power system: UPS, LV
  • Consultation of Customers within warranty support
  • Development of test program, instructions, checklists, passports on equipment in accordance with the regulatory documentation of the Russian Federation and the recommendations of the manufacturer, Participation in certification tests, equipment testing by Customer
  • Preparation of technical specifications on requests of the Customer
Requirements:
  • Special or High education in Power
  • Certificates for commission and maintenance of leading manufacturers of Power equipment (APC, Schneider, Emerson, Huawei etc)
  • Experience as cooling service engineering for more than 5 years
  • Practical experience of commission, repair, maintenance of Power systems: UPS (Huawei, APC, Eaton, Emerson), LV (Schneider, ABB), MV (main principle);
  • Support of sales of service for power system
  • Knowledge of the principles of design\construction of power systems: Uninterruptable and Guarantee power supply;
  • Understanding the principles of operation of automatic power systems
  • Knowledge of the market of the main equipment manufacturers (UPS, LV, DG, MV)

Conditions:

  • Competitive salary level and remuneration package – will be discussed with the successful candidate
  • Professional and career development opportunity.
  • Commercial medical and life insurance (after probation).
  • Mobile allowance.
